name: McVehil, G.E.; Addison, E.L.; Baugues, K.A.  2001.  Air Quality and Visibility Impacts of Powder River Basin Coal Mining at Badlands National Park
description:
DESCRIPTION
Data for estimated VOC emissions  in coal trains and PRB mines

FULL CITATION
McVehil, G.E.; Addison, E.L.; Baugues, K.A.  2001.  Air Quality and Visibility Impacts of Powder River Basin Coal Mining at Badlands National Park.
